FortigateIP.description: External IP address or Hostname of fortigate, should not include https://

Scanbotnetconnections.description: Enable monitoring or blocking connections to Botnet servers through this interface.   disable:Do not scan connections to botnet servers.   block:Block connections to botnet servers.   monitor:Log connections to botnet servers.

Mode.description: Addressing mode (static, DHCP, PPPoE).   static:Static setting.   dhcp:External DHCP client mode.   pppoe:External PPPoE mode.

Status.description: Bring the interface up or shut the interface down.   up:Bring the interface up.   down:Shut the interface down.

Deviceidentificationactivescan.description: Enable/disable active gathering of device identity information about the devices on the network connected to this interface.   enable:Enable active gathering of identity information about hosts.   disable:Disable active gathering of identity information about hosts.

Vdom.description: Interface is in this virtual domain (VDOM).

Detectprotocol.description: Protocols used to detect the server.   ping:PING.   tcp-echo:TCP echo.   udp-echo:UDP echo.

Type.description: Interface type.   physical:Physical interface.   vlan:VLAN interface.   aggregate:Aggregate interface.   redundant:Redundant interface.   tunnel:Tunnel interface.   vdom-link:VDOM link interface.   loopback:Loopback interface.   switch:Software switch interface.   hard-switch:Hardware switch interface.   vap-switch:VAP interface.   wl-mesh:WLAN mesh interface.   fext-wan:FortiExtender interface.   vxlan:VXLAN interface.   hdlc:T1/E1 interface.   switch-vlan:Switch VLAN interface.   emac-vlan:EMAC VLAN interface.

Distance.description: Distance for routes learned through PPPoE or DHCP, lower distance indicates preferred route.

Dhcprelayservice.description: Enable/disable allowing this interface to act as a DHCP relay.   disable:None.   enable:DHCP relay agent.

Mtuoverride.description: Enable to set a custom MTU for this interface.   enable:Override default MTU.   disable:Use default MTU (1500).

Srccheck.description: Enable/disable source IP check.   enable:Enable source IP check.   disable:Disable source IP check.

Role.description: Interface role.   lan:Connected to local network of endpoints.   wan:Connected to Internet.   dmz:Connected to server zone.   undefined:Interface has no specific role.

Allowaccess.description: Permitted types of management access to this interface. Add multiple types by placing space between. i.e: ping https telnet    ping:PING access.   https:HTTPS access.   ssh:SSH access.   snmp:SNMP access.   http:HTTP access.   telnet:TELNET access.   fgfm:FortiManager access.   radius-acct:RADIUS accounting access.   probe-response:Probe access.   capwap:CAPWAP access.   ftm:FTM access.

Defaultgw.description: Enable to get the gateway IP from the DHCP or PPPoE server.   enable:Enable authentication.   disable:Disable authentication.

Alias.description: Alias will be displayed with the interface name to make it easier to distinguish.
